oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Van Deventer -- Lincoln's death
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: J. Van Deventer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Note to Capt. J. Van Deventer, C.S. Vols, April 18, 1865. Orders to report, in person, to Gen. Hitchcock at the Presidential mansion(?). Signed A.E. Shiras, A.C.G.S. James Van Deventer's notes added in 1898, describing his position and duties while Abraham Lincoln's body was lying in state.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Funeral rites & ceremonies; Presidents;
